page.title: 11Education in Gunton Area
page.content: The majority of local children are transported to school free of charge by special buses organised by the Norfolk County Council,the primary schools at Aldborough and Southrepps being over two miles away. At 11+ years the children travel by school bus to new High Schools 5 miles away at Aylsham or North Walsham. Further Education prior to College or University is available at Paston Sixth Form College ,North Walsham until recently the Paston Grammer school, or City College Norwich. Private education is available for those who prefer it (and can afford it !) in nearby towns (from the age of 5 or later) of Greshams, Holt or in Norwich.
